name: Bunny (drakzlin)
description:
This game was created for OpenGameArt - Game Jam 2022 Winter.

This game was created by accident. One day, I was watching what's new on OGA. I saw art with a little rabbit and because my daughter really likes bunnies, I decided to make this mini game for her. And I see that the winter game jam is just starting ... great - so it will be for everyone on OpenGameArt who likes rabbits

(it's nice to make you happy)
